name: patagonianchallenge
description:
+ The challenge is to create an interaction with a website where:

  • the URL tutorialspoint.com/html/html_iframes.htm is loaded and the program navigates into the page below “Document content goes here…“
  • interacts with the “About us” link
  • returns the URL of the new page
  • list all URLs on the page
  • list all buttons on the page
  • list all text input fields on the page
  • creates an account and logs into the site.

+ The output should be both via console and output to the appended file

How to run the project

  • clone the repo
  • npm install on the project
  • run npx cypress open
  • select the e2e execution process on the cypress dashboard
  • run the tests on chrome for greater pleasure
